entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
